product.title: FastenMaster Collated Cortex Hidden Fastening System for Trex Enhance - 2-1/2 inch Cortex screws and plugs - Rocky Harbor (100 LF)
product.description: The FastenMaster Cortex Hidden Fastening System is the fastest, easiest way to hide fasteners in composite, cap stock, and PVC decking boards. Cortex offers a strong connection between the deck board and joist. It hides fasteners across the entire deck, first and last board, perimeter and stairs.Cortex plugs are made with the same material as leading deck boards, meaning you can achieve a perfect seamless finish across your whole deck. Once installed, Cortex plugs become a part of your deck, expanding and contracting along with the boards around them - this means your plugs will not need to be replaced for the lifetime of the project. Featuring a TORX ttap drive system and a high-strength setting tool - Cortex screws are easy to install and optimized for use by the PRO contractor. The plugs come pre-aligned on a collated strip, eliminating the need to fumble around with loose plugs and making installation 50% faster.The Spotter Lid Installation Guide enables you to position your fasteners perfectly on the scalloped Trex Enhance boards.To install, simply drive the Cortex fastener using the included setting tool - this will countersink the screw to the perfect depth. Then, place your Cortex plugs on top of the fastener holes with the grains aligned, and tap to finish.Designed to fasten 100 lineal feet of Trex Enhance Rocky Harbor decking. Includes 224, 2-1/2 inch carbon steel Cortex decking screws, 240 collated Cortex plugs and 2 Cortex setting tools.
feature_bullets: Cortex Deck, Trex screws and plugs – Enhance - Rocky Harbor
2-1/2 inch Cortex screws and plugs on a collated strip – 100 LF
Cortex Hidden Fastening System conceals your deck fasteners
descriptive_attributes: Compatible with Trex Enhance Rocky Harbor decking
100 lineal feet of coverage - Includes 224, 2-1/2 inch screws, 240 collated plugs and 2 setting tools
Hides fasteners across the entire deck, first and last board, perimeter and stairs
Cortex plugs come on a collated strip with pre-aligned grains - Eliminating the need to fumble around with loose plugs, making installation 50% faster
The Spotter Lid Installation Guide enables you to position your fasteners perfectly on the scalloped Trex Enhance boards
Cortex plugs are made from the same material as market-leading deck boards, creating a 100% perfect match every time
Cortex screws are made from high-strength carbon steel
The TORX ttap Drive System delivers a superior bit engagement for a stable wobble free installation
The Cortex setting tool is optimized for the PRO contractor - Stronger bit material and industrial grade felt will enable you to install 350 fasteners with one setting tool
Warrantied for the life of the project
